text: @SJackaman @JaneBea5 @riverlevel_0003 @EnvAgency @HunterBoots Hope you can remain calm and cheerful

@IanHopkinson_ @FriendsCoCCP It has happened quite a few times and the dam is behaving as it's designed to do. It holds the water back in the flood basin behind then allows it out slowly through a culvert low down. When the flood basin is full it flows over the top and down the sluice.
@EnvAgencyNW

@EvansColette @charlotte2153 @EnvAgencyNW Well, it isn't just the drains! It is biodiversity & concreting over greenbelt rather than using available brown belt. It's only going to get worse. Six 56 alone will be a loss of 242 acres Greenbelt with building height range upto 43.5m. 346,000m sq 54 Wembleys in total üò°

text:
Businesses in York are urged to put their flood defence plans into motion due to Storm Christoph.
